name: Snubbull
flavorText:
Although it looks
frightening, it is
actually kind and affectionate. It
is very popular
among women.

previous.name: Steelix
previous.flavorText:
It is thought its body transformed
as a result of iron accumulating
internally from swallowing soil.

next.name: Granbull
next.flavorText:
It is actually
timid and easily
spooked. If at­ tacked, it flails
about to fend off
its attacker.
